notesStmt.note: A translation, by Margaret, Countess of Richmond and Derby, of: Jacobus de Gruitroede. Speculum aureum animae peccatricis.
Sometimes attributed to Dionysius Carthusianus [i.e. Denis le Chartreux].
Imprint is from the colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Last leaf has printer's device (McKerrow 9b) on verso.
Identified as STC 6898 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
